src:
Overwatch 2 es oficial y se ha presentado con esta pedazo de cinemática [BlizzCon 2019] 
01 Nov 2019 by Diario Tecnología
Esta ha sido una semana intensa para las filtraciones de la Blizzcon, y una de las más sonadas ha sido la de la secuela de Overwatch. Efectivamente, los rumores eran realidad.
Overwatch 2 ha sido anunciado oficialmente en la ceremonia de apertura de Blizzard. Se ha presentado con una increíble cinemática en la que Winston consigue reunir a los héroes del juego para iniciar la historia. 

En desarrollo





Artículo original
text:
Overwatch 2 is official and has been presented with this piece of kinematics [BlizzCon 2019]
01 Nov 2019 by Diario Tecnología
This has been an intense week for Blizzcon leaks, and one of the most popular has been the sequel to Overwatch. Indeed, the rumors were reality.
Overwatch 2 has been officially announced at the opening ceremony of Blizzard. It has been presented with an incredible cinematic in which Winston manages to gather the heroes of the game to start the story.

Developing





Original article
